data.prayer: God, guide the 256,057 believers in Embu to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Embu, Kenya
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 256,057 believers in Embu to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Embu, Kenya need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 516,200 people living in the state of Embu.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Munyoyaya people.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Embu to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Embu, Kenya a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Embu, Kenya has a population of 516,200.

We estimate Embu has 256,057 people who might know Jesus, 156,010 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 104,134 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Embu, Kenya, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.
